first_ip.Description: The first IPv4 or IPv6 address in the CIDR range.

last_ip.Description: The last IPv4 or IPv6 address in the CIDR range.

mask.Description: The IPv4 or IPv6 network mask.

mask_bits.Description: The number bits in the IPv4 or IPv6 network mask.

network.Description: The IPv4 or IPv6 network in CIDR notation.

prefix.Description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address and network mask in CIDR notation. The address may denote a specific address (using a host identifier, such as `10.0.0.1/8`), or the beginning address of an entire network (using a host identifier of 0, such as `10.0.0.0/8`).
